segments.text: I observe the woman facing away from the chaos, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs unchecked, causing the sink to overflow dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the cabinet fronts onto the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel sorry for her impending surprise.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy perches on the two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by holding out her hand expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky operation brings a smile to my face.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, the stool's tilt has me on edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A slip on the wet floor could make it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter might crash if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window's view of the garden is so inviting and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene mixes joy with hidden dangers perfectly.
segments.speaker: PAR
